parameters.query: SELECT p.*, ap.profile_id, ap.provider as antidetect_provider, mp.proxy_host, mp.proxy_port, mp.proxy_username, mp.proxy_password FROM pva_accounts p LEFT JOIN antidetect_profiles ap ON p.antidetect_profile_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN mobile_proxy_pool mp ON p.proxy_id = mp.id WHERE p.status = 'active' AND p.trust_score > 50 ORDER BY p.last_activity_at ASC NULLS FIRST LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM warming_action_templates WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY weight DESC

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, skipped: true, message: $json.message }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO account_warming_sessions (youtube_account_id, channel_id, session_type, target_actions, status, started_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, 'running', NOW()) RETURNING id
UPDATE account_warming_sessions SET status = 'completed', completed_actions = $2, actions_log = $3, completed_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
UPDATE pva_accounts SET last_activity_at = NOW(), trust_score = LEAST(trust_score + 1, 100) WHERE id = $1
